text: Maëva Squiban (born 19 March 2002) is a French professional racing cyclist, who rides since 2024 for the .Maeva Squiban and Lotte Claes to join Arkea-B&B; Hotels in 2024 In August 2020 she started as a trainee at UCI Women's Continental Team Stade Rochelais Charente-Maritime and signed from 2021 a contract with the team. At the French National Road Race Championships she finished in the under-23 category second in 2021 and third in 2023. Squiban rode in the 2022 Tour de France. Due to a crash in the second stage, she broke her sacrum and had to leave the Tour. At the 2024 Tour de France she finished second in stage 7 and fifth overall in the young rider classification. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:French cyclists Category:Sportswomen
title: Maëva Squiban
